casebody.data:
MOHASCO/FUTORIAN CORPORATION and Hartford Accident and Indemnity Company v. Icy M. POWELL. No. 54304. Supreme Court of Mississippi. Aug. 1, 1984. John P. Fox, Thomas J. Lowe, Jr., Jackson, for appellants. Roy 0. Parker, Roy 0. Parker & Associates, Tupelo, for appellee. Before PATTERSON, C.J., and DAN M. LEE and PRATHER, JJ.

Rehearing Denied Oct. 3, 1984.
